1.title: Mini Cujo
1.plot: Mother and daughter are being driven crazy by their Chihuahua, Apple.David returned recently from the Navy only to find himself in a war at home. His mother Miriam's 13-year-old Malti-poo, Cujo, hates him, and goes on the attack the minute they lock eyes.

2.title: Pint Sized Monster
2.plot: Jackie and Kelly have been best friends since they were 8-years-old. But now that their longtime friendship is being torn apart by Kelly's pint-sized Pomeranian, Dre. Elvia and Jack are a recently engaged couple with a tiny terror of a Pomeranian.

3.title: My Dog Is Ruining My Love Life
3.plot: Chihuahua Polpette, attacks Paul whenever he tries to get close to Nicole. Flozell is tearing a family of eight apart.

imdb.plot outline: Tiny pups are not always as cute and sweet as they seem. From these pups' incessant barking at strangers to ankle bites that end with hospitalizations, MY TINY TERROR's expert dog trainer Jacqueline Wilson sets out to show some tiny but naughty dogs how to mind their manners.
imdb.title: My Tiny Terror
plot: Tiny pups are not always as cute and sweet as they seem. From these pups' incessant barking at strangers to ankle bites that end with hospitalizations, MY TINY TERROR's expert dog trainer Jacqueline Wilson sets out to show some tiny but naughty dogs how to mind their manners.
